name: Levitation Attack (V)
Lore: 'Vader used his mastery of the Force to levitate objects from around the room. This calculated attack was designed to break Luke''s spirit as well as his body.',
Text: 'Deploy (or retrieve) a device (for free) from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. (Immune to Sense.)  OR  Cancel Sabotage targeting a device.  OR  During a battle, place your weapon or device present in Used Pile to add 2 to your total power (3 if Vader present).(Errata Text - September 9th, 2009)',
